altText.description: A short description for an alternate way to carry out the action. For screen reader users who will not be able to navigate to the button easily/quickly.
altText.description_zh: 一个简短的描述,用于执行操作的替代方式.对于无法轻松/快速导航到按钮的屏幕阅读器用户.

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改默认渲染的元素为作为子元素传递的元素, 合并它们的属性和行为.

as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.
as.description_zh: 此组件应渲染为的元素或组件. 可以被 `asChild` 覆盖.
